trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class that represents a tracking channel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> basisklasse som representerer en sporing kanal.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] If a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> is present, the runtime tracking infrastructure calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> to get a tracking channel for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Hvis en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>finnes, kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur kall <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A>å hente en sporing kanal for en arbeidsflytforekomst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this tracking channel to send tracking records associated with the workflow instance back to the host application whenever the tracking infrastructure matches a track point in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Kjøring sporing infrastruktur bruker sporing kanalen til å sende sporing poster knyttet til arbeidsflytforekomsten tilbake til vertsprogrammet når sporing-infrastruktur samsvarer med et Sporingspunkt i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>knyttet til arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Your application can treat this tracking information in any way you choose.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan behandle denne sporingsinformasjon slik du velger.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> writes tracking information to a SQL database.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>skriver sporingsinformasjon til en SQL-database.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: To create a tracking channel for your tracking service, derive a class from the TrackingChannel base class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en sporing kanal for din Sporingstjenesten utledet en klasse fra TrackingChannel basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters> object passed by the runtime tracking infrastructure in its call to your implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> to associate each instance of your tracking channel with a specific workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters>objektet som er sendt av kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur i kallet til implementeringen din av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A>å knytte hver forekomst av sporing-kanal til en bestemt arbeidsflytforekomst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine requests a tracking channel from each tracking service that has provided a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren ber om en sporing ble fra hver Sporingstjenesten som er angitt en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>for en arbeidsflytforekomst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, notifies a receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel has either completed or terminated.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, varsler mottakeren av data på sporing kanalen som arbeidsflytforekomsten som er tilknyttet sporing kanalen er fullført eller avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure calls InstanceCompletedOrTerminated to notify the receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with this tracking channel has either terminated or completed.
trans-unit.target: Kjøring sporing infrastruktur kaller InstanceCompletedOrTerminated til å varsle mottakeren av data på sporing kanalen som arbeidsflytforekomsten som er forbundet med denne sporing kanalen har avsluttet eller er fullført.

trans-unit.source: No more data will be sent on the tracking channel.
trans-unit.target: Ingen flere data sendes på kanalen sporing.

trans-unit.source: When InstanceCompletedOrTerminated is called, you may perform whatever actions are required by your implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: Når InstanceCompletedOrTerminated kalles, kan du utføre handlingene kreves av implementeringen din av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sends a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> on the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, sender en <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref> på den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure calls Send to deliver a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord> on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> when it matches a track point in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Kjøring sporing infrastruktur kaller Send å levere et <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord>på <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>når den samsvarer med et Sporingspunkt i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can treat the tracking information sent on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> in whatever manner the requirements of your application dictate.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle sporingsinformasjon sendes på den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>på måten angir kravene til programmet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>
